description: This is the Sass version of popover. Following example displays popover using css styles only.
name: Popover - Styles
usage:
Popover position can be changed by specifying the correct css class. Popover header can be added by 'popover__header' and 'popover__heading' css classes. #### Left side popover with header ```html
HeadingText
Etiam posuere orci lorem pellem tesque. quis volutpat arcu fringilla. Aliquam erat volutpat.
``` If you are using the Sass version of this component, the popover display position centering (where it is in relation to the button/trigger element - making sure the popover is properly centered) will have to be connected through your own scripting as the Sass will only move the caret around and provide general positioning features. While the Sass will do most of the work, the popover will need to be dynamically moved around depending the height and width of the trigger elements (a button, in this demo). As an example, this demo contains a button that's 30px tall, so the popover needs to be 15px from the top. If the button were taller, that value would need to increase as well. This positioning can be easily calculated by getting the height/width of the trigger element, dividing by 2 and applying that style to the popover: ```javascript const button = document.querySelector('.popover-button'); const popover = document.querySelector('.popover.popover--left'); popover.style.left = (button.offsetWidth / 2) + 'px'; ```
